Subject: The order to hold fire

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He stepped back from Perndabot, when Iron Raptor gave the order to stop.
He didn't agree but he wouldn't disobay.

::Epyon::

He saw that the femm bot was in command. He didn't get the order to stan
down. They were surrendering?! He pulled back, returning his beam saber
to its holster. He waited to see what happaned.
